snippet: Degree Men, the deodorant by Unilever, is trying to increase the interaction with 18- to 35-year-old consumers with content that is tailored to social gaming sites.
abstract: Elizabeth Olson Advertising column notes Degree Men, the deodorant by Unilever, is trying to increase interaction with 18- to 35-year-old consumers with content that is tailored to social gaming sites.

headline.seo: Degree Men Deodorant Turns to Video Marketing
headline.main: Mixing Marketing With Social Games and Extreme Sports
